title: EYL #60 Big Business feat. Greg Parker
itunes:title: EYL #60 Big Business feat. Greg Parker
description:
Greg Parker aka Big Business is a legend in real estate. He has singlehandedly played a major part in redeveloping his home town of North Philadelphia with his real estate construction and investing businesses. He has been featured on Love and Hip Hop, Black Enterprise and the Philadelphia Inquirer. Greg has put himself in a unique position by being able to not only buy homes but renovate the properties with his in-house construction company. In addition to that he works with his wife who helps people receive financing for investment deals. A few years ago he took his talents to Cleveland and has been changing the city ever since. He owns over 500 doors in the city and is responsible for a massive amount of new residential reconstruction in and around the city of Cleveland. On Episode 60 he broke down his investment strategy, he explained the process of fixing up properties, he talked about how to evaluate a good contractor, and he went into detail about the Cleveland real estate market. #Realestateflip #realestate Guest IG: @bigbizzneesss Book Tip: The Adventures of Apple Parker EYL Website: www.earnyourleisure.com --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/earnyourleisure/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
